bug.description: like the title, when i use the 7zip to extract the CityEnviron.zip.001 for linux, it report errors: Path = CityEnviron.zip Type = zip ERRORS: Headers Error Unconfirmed start of archive WARNINGS: There are data after the end of archive Physical Size = 3117932051 Tail Size = 30606 ERROR: Data Error : CityEnviron/Content/Paks/CityEnviron-LinuxNoEditor.pak Sub items Errors: 1 Archives with Errors: 1 Warnings: 1 Open Errors: 1 Sub items Errors: 1

comments.comment:
I encountered similar problem. When I extract it, it is requiring password. Following are the error when I use 7zip desktop
/home/qiang/Downloads/CityEnviron.zip.001 CityEnviron.zip Headers Error Unconfirmed start of archive Warnings: There are some data after the end of the payload data Data error : CityEnviron/Content/Paks/CityEnviron-LinuxNoEditor.pak
i can't extract the file when i use a ubuntu environment but when i use the windows it works fine!
